adaptableLearningRates

Class IDBDwk.IDBDwkCommon

  • java.lang.Object
    • adaptableLearningRates.IDBDwk.IDBDwkCommon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LearningRates.LRCommon
    Enclosing class:
    IDBDwk

    public static class IDBDwk.IDBDwkCommon
extends java.lang.Object
implements LearningRates.LRCommon
    Maintains two parameters, that are common for all weights of the system in IDBD_WK. The first parameter is k_acc, the second is omega_k (which is a constant). With omega_k = 0, we get the original IDBD-algorithm.
    Author:
    Markus Thill
